tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE trade_history (
    trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    trade_date DATE,
    trade_symbol VARCHAR(20),
    trade_type VARCHAR(10),
    entry_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    exit_price DECIMAL(10,2),
    trade_result VARCHAR(10)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
  trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_date DATE,
  trade_symbol VARCHAR(50),
  trade_volume INT,
  trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
  metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  trade_date DATE,
  strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
  win_rate DECIMAL(5, 2),
  sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
 trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 symbol VARCHAR(50),
 trade_date DATE,
 trade_price DECIMAL(10, 2),
 trade_quantity INT
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
 metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trade_id INT,
 performance_date DATE,
 total_return DECIMAL(10, 2),
 sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(5, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
    trade_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP NOT NULL,
    action VARCHAR(10) NOT NULL,
    instrument VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    quantity INT NOT NULL,
    price DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_performance (
    performance_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    date DATE NOT NULL,
    total_trades INT NOT NULL,
    total_profit DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    win_rate DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE strategy_metrics (
    metric_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    max_drawdown DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL,
    sharpe_ratio DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL,
    annual_return DECIMAL(5, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE backtest_results (
    result_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
    strategy_id INT NOT NULL,
    start_date DATE NOT NULL,
    end_date DATE NOT NULL,
    performance_metric VARCHAR(20) NOT NULL,
    value DECIMAL(10, 2) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE trade_history (
 trade_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 trade_date TIMESTAMP,
 strategy_id INT,
 ticker_symbol VARCHAR(10),
 trade_type VARCHAR(10),
 trade_qty INT,
 trade_price NUMERIC
);

CREATE TABLE performance_metrics (
 metric_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_id INT,
 metric_date DATE,
 traded_volume INT,
 profit_loss NUMERIC,
 win_rate NUMERIC
);

CREATE TABLE backtesting_strategies (
 strategy_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
 strategy_name VARCHAR(50),
 strategy_description TEXT,
 strategy_code TEXT,
 created_by VARCHAR(50),
 created_date TIMESTAMP
);
